figure_1: Main cell lineages (A) and their crosstalk in an osteoimmunological context (B). Abbreviations: IL = interleukin, RANKL = Receptor Activator of Nuclear factor Kappa-B Ligand, SFRP1 = Secreted Frizzled-Related Protein 1, Th = T helper, TNF-α = Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha, Treg = T regulator.
figure_2: Schematization of carcinogenesis during age-related lobular involution process. Abbreviations: IL = interleukin, RANKL = Receptor Activator of Nuclear factor Kappa-B Ligand, SFRP1 = Secreted Frizzled-Related Protein 1, TNF-α = Tumor Necrosis Factor-alpha.
